about.heading: I'm Carlos Noguez, a Flutter Developer, crafting seamless cross-platform experiences for mobile, web, and desktop
about.description: Flutter Developer with 4 years of experience. Passionate about crafting intuitive user interfaces with a strong focus on UI/UX design. I also have 2 years of experience leading Flutter development projects, delivering scalable and efficient solutions. Eager to learn and grow while delivering scalable and efficient solutions.

projects.title: Leistung Greta
projects.description: This company is involved with a medical technology traceability system that streamlines the management of healthcare equipment, automating its lifecycle from acquisition to disposal.

projects.title: Betterfly
projects.description: This company is involved with services like telemedicine, gift cards, financial health tools, health insurance, fitness, meditation and mindfulness.

projects.title: Ultrix Labs LLC
projects.description: This company is involved with a software factory, having an end client (HAMA OPCO SPV LIMITED) in the cuisine industry.

projects.title: Geminus
projects.description: I developed multiple applications for various end clients, as part of a leading software factory. Due to NDA agreements, I am unable to disclose specific details about the projects

projects.title: Click & Correct
projects.description: This client is a director of a prestigious university, with the goal of creating an app for managing tasks and solutions for both students and professors, with the option to receive a small payment.

projects.title: UnoExpress
projects.description: This company is involved in package traceability, managing shipments from the USA to Honduras via air, sea, or road transportation.
